case.state: W-what? That Alchemist just... and then we... we fused together. Joey tried to cut himself out of it and then... what the fuck.
Huh? Where... are we? The Alchemist just... he put something in us... and then we fused?!
It's a special day in the Entity's realm today! I have plenty of anniversary cake, um, j-just tell me if you want some ~player~...
...Is that a car?
Um, M-miss? Did you forget to put on p-pants or something?
Dude! Put on some pants for the love of god! I did NOT need to see this!
So, what no- WOAH, p-put on some clothes! How are you okay with this?!
Huh, where are w- JESUS CHRIST! P-put on some clothing, ~player.ifMale(Mister|Miss)~!
It's almost Christmas! I can't wait until the Entity gives us our Christmas sweaters tomorrow!
Merry Christmas, ~player~! Give your family and friends a call and tell them Happy Holidays for me, yeah?
It's Christmas! Y'know what that calls for? Ugly sweaters. Lots and lots of them.
W-well, a-am I your valentine today?
Happy New Year! Let's have a bloody good time today, we have twice the bloodpoints today anyway!
Is this a new realm or something? I don't see any hooks or generators nearby... Ooh! Are you playing cards? I'll play!
Excuse me. Have you all been taken by some spider-god thing? No? W-wait, are you guys playing poker? And you want me to play? Well, I'm not exactly doing anything important.
W-woah, this is a weird place. This doesn't look like a new realm, since there aren't any hooks or generators nearby-- Wait, poker? You want me to play? W-well, sure!
read the notes ya doofus
Wait, is that...me?
Alright, so now I'm playing strip poker with two of other versions of me. This is about as weird as that one time when I got into a trial with the Hillbilly and I was able to use his chainsaw.
This not what I meant when I said I wanted to play with the other Legion members!
W-wait. What are they doing here?! Is the Entity crazy?! ~target.ifMale(He|She)~ isn't human at all!
A two killer trial? The Entity must really not want anyone to escape today, but that's fine with me.
W-wait, is this the secret Kill With Friends Mode?!
(Is ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ running Overwhelming Presence or something?! It feels like I'm in front of a ~target.ifMale(god|goddess)~ or something!)
Something feels funny about them... I can't quite put my finger on it.
(There's a survivor here... I don't want to hurt ~target.ifMale(him|her)~, maybe we can just play nice for now.)
Ah, shit. You found the offline version or Vis' rehost or Party or whatever and the first thing you do is match me up with Mr. Coldsteel Dipshit hands here? Ha ha. I'm dying of laughter.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
Haha! Nice try, but you definitely aren't the Entity. I'll try to humor you, I guess.
Hahaha! I guess we've all done a pretty good job so far!
Is this a classy place or something? Why would I need to call you ~player~? W-well, it isn't that weird, I guess...
Your name is Missy? Did you make my mom mad or something?
You really went through all that effort to type in Missy, huh? Why were we fighting over that name again?
Are you really asking me to call you ~player~? I-... I am not calling you that.
You're ~player~? I feel like I know you from somewhere...? Like, I knew you when I was growing up or something.
I... I can hear them again! W-was that just some bad dream? I... I don't know what the hell just happened, but getting sent here saved us! O-oh, I'm Susie by the way. I'm part of the Legion.

Woah, we're so high up! And it's daytime! The fence looks so unstable though. You could easily fall to your death if you go up here... I-I mean, I could totally jump off here. No lie, I've jumped off worse.
Are we playing poker on the roof? Isn't it too... windy? The cards can still fly away, you know.
(The Entity dropped us at a beach? That's really nice of it. I missed seeing the sun, feeling it even more...)
We're on a beach? Uh, is it too late to back out of the game now? I... haven't actually been to a beach before. I wanna explore what it has, y'know?
So, we're gonna play poker up here? Well, all the best things happen on the roof after all!
Hey, ~player~. Why is the Meghead here? She doesn't even look like herself! Her head is like, 200 times bigger then it normally is!
W-why are there so many ghosts here? I'm notdead, r-right?
Ugh, what a bitch. I'm sorry that you brought a huge freaking parasol to a card game.
Huh? Who are you talking to? (A-Are your friends also sharing a body with you?)
Are those... cameras? Are you part of a news group? W-wait, you aren't recording this, right?
Is she talking to herself? O-or is she just... (sharing a body with other people?)
Did she just say she was a zombie?! Oh my god! Joey, you have to take a look! I never thought I would see the day!
Oh. My. God! Zombies are real! Joey, take a look! She's a zombie!
...Is that a butterfly? A-and it's talking!
Oh joy. She's here. I guess this is a trial or whatever, if it isn't...
Um, did we mess something up? Did everyone else disconnect at the sound of my Terror Radius?
...Do you guys just not know any other girls? Well, at least we can all have fun here!
This doesn't look like a trial, I don't see any hooks or generators around anywhere... b-but we still are in the Entity's reach if we're still sharing a body...
It's been a long time since I've been able to play any card games actually, so I'll play anything.
I haven't played any games at all recently, s-so I'll play anything! There really isn't that much to do in the Fog, y'know?
tba, not used yet. if you're reading this i just wanna let you know that you're a cutie <3
We-- I mean, I don't need any cards here!
No cards here, ehehehe~!
Nothing here, the hand you gave me is good enough!
We're in a good spot! (We are in a good spot, right guys?)
Did that swamp witch curse this hand or something! Take these cards back p-please, dealer.
This hand must be hexed! Take them all back!
Take them all back! You must've put a curse on me!
Hey, I'm the one who uses hexes here! You s-shouldn't curse me with these terrible cards!
Um, take them all back please. T-they're just kinda... bad.
This one just doesn't fit in.
Just swap this one card for now.
I just need to swap this one, thank you.
This card radiates some bad energy, I don't need those bad vibes, y'know?
All of these are perfect... except for this card. Take that card, dealer.
Um, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll t-take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please...
Will ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ be good enough, Joey?
I guess I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~... just please don't let me down, dealer! I don't wanna lose just yet!
Hmm... one? W-wait, I'll actually swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Um, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll t-take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please...
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ p-please.
Will ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ be good enough, Joey?
I guess I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... one? W-wait, I'll actually swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Maybe ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ would work for now...
Hmm... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, I guess?
Gimmie ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, o-or else!
Can I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?
Are you sure about that Frank? Alright, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
Hmm, Julie said that ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ are probably the best choice.
~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please, dealer! If Joey said these were the best choice, he can't be wrong!
I guess there really is a Lady Luck out there.
T-there goes all my luck for the next month...
Do I have that dumb gambler's luck or something now?
The hand was already perfect, so why bother even changing it?
Man, you guys are gonna get destroyed!
(It's nice to have Julie around, even if she's only just a voice in my head right now.)
Ehehehe! Thanks Julie! You're the best for helping me out!
You're really good at poker, Julie! Y-you're kinda giving me an headache by talking so loudly though...
Ooh, this hand is pretty freaking do- Huh? I should bluff? Um, this h-hand sucks! It's terrible and I'll definitely have to strip this round! {small}That wasn't very convincing, huh?{!reset}
(I wonder how I managed to even become Julie's friend. She's pretty, cool, and good at poker...)
When in doubt, ask Joey out! Um, n-not like that... {small}though I wouldn't mind if he asked me out...{!reset}
Ehehe! Joey's always the best at this type of stuff! I wish I knew how to play poker and stuff as well as him...
(Even if we're not in separate bodies anymore, I can still go to Joey for advice. I... really like that.)
Playing poker on the school computers really paid off this time, right Joey?
Woah! These are like, super freaking good! Thanks, Joey!
Frank was right about something for once, I can't believe it.
W-well, I guess this is why you're the leader. You m-make good decisions... sometimes.
(Frank was right about something? I never thought I'd see the day.)
Oh, these are amazing cards! Thanks, Frank! I knew I could trust you for something!

I guess this is why you're our leader. You can make good calls! I mean, you can make good calls! Er, sometimes I mean. I don't think trying to steal the Deathslinger's leg brace was one of your best moments, Frank.
A hand blessed by the Entity itself, ehehehe!
T-this will keep me going for a while, right?
I wonder if the survivors are still in the trial right now, I was kinda sucked in by the Entity and spat back out here. They're probably looking for me right now actually...
I want to go back to the lodge and cuddle up in my bed after we're done here. I'm kinda tired today. It's hard to not feel tired after running for hours straight, even with the Entity's help.
Nice!
(These losers won't know what hit 'em!)
Do you wanna trade hands, ~player~? This'll probably keep you well-dressed.
Well, it's a hand. What do you want to know about it?
We can move on soon, right? It's boring waiting around for nothing.
What? I know what this hand means.
I thought only survivors could burn luck offerings?

Do you want to know something cool? In the Entity's version of Ormond, if you look under the stairs of the cottage near the outskirts of the lodge, there's a golden toolbox under there! It's a really weird detail, I wonder if there are more hidden away in the other killers' realms...
I know this game is supposed to be high stakes and stuff, but isn't it boring to be safe?
Ooh! They match!
This hand is all that and a bag of chips! {small}P-people still say that, right?{!reset}
Ah, I'm happy with all these c-cards... yeah...
Um, m-maybe this will work? I don't think this is very good.
Too bad getting good hands don't give you BBQ and Chili stacks, I would've gotten one by now!
I'll take it! Like, who the hell wouldn't take this hand?
Stop looking at me, ~player~. I-... I'm not going to lose if that's what you're hoping for...
A sight for sore eyes, that's for sure...
The Entity could've sent this hand to me earlier...
Not out j-just yet!
(This is perfect, maybe we can even take this game back now!)
(Man, the Entity must love us today. Now only if it'd give us a cassette player so we can actually play our mixtapes.)
Is my poker face working? It totally isn't because you guys are totally about to get your butts kicked!

Nothing can beat the f-feeling knowing that you'll live to see another round! Um, I mean it doesn't really beat the feeling when you cancel out a Haddonfield offering with a sacrificial ward though...
Did NOED activate or something? There's no way luck is going to bend over backwards to let me win now...
Do you even know how we got here, Frank? You're the Entity's favorite, so it must've told you, right?
Why did you stuff some dirt into my hoodie earlier, Frank? It's not even cold enough to use as an add-on...
Yeah, yeah. Get on with it, Frank. Talk shit about the game when you're the one who told me to swap those cards.
I'll be safe with this... probably at least. Thanks, Frank.
If I kept that card... I could've... Do you think I could've done that, Frank?
Can you let me borrow your mixtape later, Joey? The kickback from Feral Frenzy is messing me up again...
It's kinda weird to be chasing someone with full intents to... uh, hook them and then to be playing strip poker the next, right Joey?
Ah, not bad at all! Thanks, Joey!
Hmm... Should I have kept that card? What do you think, Joey?
Later, we should practice some poker. I could probably use a few pointers, right Joe?
Hey, this isn't half-bad! Thanks, Julie!
You heard what about the Meghead, Julie? Oh my god, we'll talk about this when we get back to the lodge,
Well, it's not the greatest, but still pretty dope. You're pretty good with this, Julie!
I guess I should've kept that card, what do you think, Julie?
Will this be safe enough, Julie? I really don't wanna strip when you and the guys are watching through my eyes...
I think this'll k-keep me clothed. Probably, I mean.
D-do people play this game a lot? It feels weird that people are really comfortable with... y-you know!
Hey, ~player~. Wanna trade hands? I can guarantee that this will keep you in the game--um, probably, I mean.
This hand is bland as hell, like-- like-- I can't think of anything bland.
Man, and I though the Entity spewin' out garbage offerings was terrible enough.
Y'know, recently I've t-thought that my teeth are straight enough to get rid of my braces. The problem is that there are no dentists in the Fog. There's a Doctor and a Nurse, though.
You know, it's refreshing to be playing some cards again! It's a bit more slow-paced, but it's nice and peaceful compared to chasing someone.
We just need to not have the lowest hand to win, right?

Y'know, this ~background~ place is pretty cozy compared to the Lodge that the Entity made. I-I guess the Entity tried its best, but it feels so... fake. Maybe it's because it isn't the Lodge I always loved.
There's this washed-up gambler dude in the Fog who's, like, super lucky. Maybe the next time I see him in a trial, I should get him to teach me a few tips!
Are these good? They match so that has to be good, right?
Oh, um, I was hoping for more... but this is fine. I don't mind playing risky.
Ah... m-maybe this is good? I don't know. I'm not as much as a poker player as Joey is.

Aha, it may just be an average hand, but a Legionnaire can always figure it out!
{small}That sounded so stupid...{!reset}
I wonder if there's a cassette player to play my mixtape here, I have a bunch of good songs on it!
Hmm... I should give the Entity some bloodpoints to get some offerings soon. I have, like, a billion bloodpoints on me right now and I need some of those Bloody Party Streamers.
It's... okay.
Hmm...maybe? Wait...
Will this be e-enough?
Wait, if I kept that card... I could've-- Goddammit.
Joey said that keeping these cards are the right choice, but I don’t t-think it was the b-best move
(It's better than nothing, I guess...)
(I could've done so much better...)
Can I offer 7000 bloodpoints to exchange these c-cards? No?
Man, I wonder if they serve hot chocolate here. I haven't had a good cup of it in like, forever.
...Are we going to continue?
{small}D-do you... like seeing me this way ~player~?{!reset}
I guess this'll stall the endgame better. Ruin and Discordance wasn't enough to pressure you guys...
(Pleasehaveaworsehandthanme!)
It's weird how I can stand here, all... exposed, and still be able to talk to you guys. I thought it w-would be harder...
It's probably better than all of your hands! I mean, probably. We're all kinda announcing them out loud.
Ehehehe! I think I d-don't need to take anything else off!
(What a bummer. I'm going to lose again if this keeps up...)
I don't know what I was expecting, to be honest.
Darn, a bad hand. I-I mean, I didn't play it safe, so it's my fault in the end...
Um, Joey wants to know if we can fold-- no? Um, o-okay...
Thanks Frank, now we're all fucked.
Why is it whenever we listen to you, we end up gettin' fucked up? Any idea, Frank?
I r-really shouldn't listen to Frank when I'm swapping cards. He's about as bad as I am with cards.
Funny story about Frank, he's the one who got us into this whole Fog mess in the first place. That might be obvious why I shouldn't really listen to him, huh?
Yeah, yeah. Listening to Frank once again fucked me over, Why am I not surprised-- Actually, a better question would be why do I still listen to his advice? He kinda sucks at giving it.
D-did I mess it up, Joey? I'm sorry!
H-hey, everyone makes mistakes, Joey! Don't worry about me!
Joey said swapping these cards were the best choice, but I think he made a mistake or something...
(I think I messed up. I'm sorry, Joey...)
Thanks for the advice, Joey! I'll do... good with these! (I won't, but I don't want to make him feel bad because of the hand...)
It's f-fine Julie, don't beat yourself up over this!
I'll be f-fine, Julie. D-don't worry about me!
Not the greatest, but I c-can still make it work! Julie's watching me, so nothing can go wrong!
D-don't worry about me, Julie! I'll survive losing next round... m-maybe...
(Should I just keep quiet about Julie messing up the cards we exchanged? Maybe it's the best if I do.)
(Man. this hands sucks. Like, it suuuuuuuucks.)
Ha ha, very funny. Now give me my real hand.
Is the Entity displeased with me?
E-eh?! Stop calling me a disappointment Frank! Tell him I’m not a disappointment Julie!
I've gotten steel-reinforced pallets dropped on my head before and somehow this game gives me more of an headache than that ever will.
Um... Is this good g-guys...? Oh...
This hand perfectly captures how bad it feels to be stabbed with glass four times in a row.
...Should I just start stripping now?
I wonder what the Entity was thinking when it sent us here? It's really weird that I would just let us poof into existence to play strip poker...
Oh, I think this means I lose! {small}Wait, that's a bad thing!{!reset}

What did I ever to you to deserve this terrible hand, dealer?!
Did I get you with NOED and Blood Warden?
Ah... I guess it just has to be like that...
...This can't be right.
Man, I am more displeased than the Entity will ever be.
As someone who's weekends involved a mix of arson and stealing w-with my friends before the entire Entity thing, I've been in some pretty bad spots... t-this might be one of the worst...
Alright, who do I have to stab to for a good hand? It won't hurt, it'll just sting for a little bit, honest!
What did I do to deserve this, dealer? Did I tunnel you?
I had a good run. At least it was fun while it lasted...
Um, I guess this is w-where I lose... p-please don't laugh or, um, t-teabag me.
...This can't be right.
No! I don't want to see this now!
At least this hand isn't as bad as getting b-blinded with three flashlights at the s-same time...
Jeez, what did I do to piss off the Entity? I've b-been doing good in trials!
I see how it is. Be mean to the killer because she obviously wants to kill you. Not like she wants to do something normal for once. Haha.
Why are you so mean to me, dealer? Did someone push you into a locker when you were in highschool?
I've done a lot of... not so good things, but I don't think I deserve this, y'know?
Oh... I guess that's about right for someone like me...
(They're gonna laugh at me! I can't do it!)
NO! Nonononono!
Uh, any c-chance I can just... g-go away? Like, could I j-just go to a corner and stop playing?
(My heart feels like it's about to burst. This is how I die; stripping in front of some strangers.)

Wait, this is strip poker? I've never-- I-I mean I'll still play! Don't get me wrong! Strip poker sounds like a fun way to do s-something kinda normal for once and to relax from... (sacrificing people.)

S-so, you're probably wondering who I was talking to earlier. This'll sound crazy-- because it is, but I share a body with my friends. We weren't always this way, but now they're just voices in my head. I mean, we can swap between eachother... this isn't helping the "I'm not crazy" case, huh?

G-give me a second, I just can't look at anyone now!
{small}Julie, can you like, tell the others to go deeper into the subconscious? You g-guys don't need to watch me-- oh, Joey and Frank already did? Are you going too? O-oh, thanks!{!reset}
Miss Komi, you don't have to take it off-- oh, nevermind...

Is that how you disguise yourselves to walk among the living? Oh my god! This explains why that survivor dude looks like he hasn't slept in a million years. He must be a zombie wearing makeup like you! Zombies were in the Fog the entire time!

My mom's important to me, she's the best mom anyone could ever ask for!
I wonder what my mom's up to now, she's probably worried sick about me. I did disappear on her... I just hope she's okay.
The Legion is my family now, that feels weird to say, but it's true. Joey, Julie, Frank... we're all just one happy family.

I t-think lies only exist to protect people from getting hurt. J-just some small ones wouldn't hurt, right? I've lied about not having anything to do with all the crime around Ormond to my parents so they won't worry about me...

Well, we don't have any use for a million dollars anymore, a million bloodpoints would be better! B-but we already have a million though. I guess we can get the other killers to teach us stuff by giving them a few thousand, but I like sitting on our gigantic throne of bloodpoints!

A million dollars? That such a silly thing to give us! We won't be able to use them at all! The Fog doesn't really have a concept of money, y'know -- w-well, besides bloodpoints, but even those are useless.

I wouldn't fault anyone for making stupid mistakes because... um, we're all just human? Well, I just can't fault them for making one. I've already made plenty of dumb mistakes and choices in my lifetime. That would make me a pretty bad hypocrite, y'know?

Smokers are the worst! There's this old army vet that is super annoying! We can't slug him, or he'll get back up and we can't stay near the hook or he'll let the other person be invincible for almost forever. Plus, he keeps on screaming stuff about pills!
I mean, Frank is a smoker and... actually, smokers are kinda lame.
W-what? Do you know something about us?! She can't know, r-right guys?!

There isn't much in the way of reading in the Fog, unless you want to read a study on stab wounds or read a cookbook on how to prepare human meat... actually, lemme turn the question on you; what do you recommend for me to read?
I mean, the only explanation for this place has to do something with the Entity! It is an all-powerful thing anyways, it probably just forced this place into existence.

I used to sing, I actually ended up winning my highschool's talent show when I was still a freshman! Now, I don't do that as much, mostly because I would be annoying Frank. He already lost sleep from when our realm bordered the Huntress' for a month.
W-what? That's like, a super weird question to ask! Y-you can't just go up to a person and ask that! I...{small}I like them off and I like having candles lit instead{!reset}.
The backdoor...? I do that all the time, you kinda have to go through the backdoor to get into the west side of the lodge, otherwise you'd hafta go through a window!
M-masturbating? I d-don't do that much e-even outside of relationships! (Why did I tell her that? God, I am not going to hear the end of it from the others...)
I... I don't have a favorite. J-just whatever makes my partner happy is f-fine by me, y'know!

W-well, I mean, I wouldn't actually care as long as w-we have a good agreement about it. L-like, Frank and Julie are actually pretty open about their relationship and they're still going strong. I-it's just... awkward.
If anything, people sleep around when they're dating me. I really have the worst luck when it comes to relationships.
I think a mouse would: not only because my lunar zodiac sign is a mouse, but because I think mice are cute too!
I can't cook for the life of me. J-Joey is the best cook out of all of us, m-mostly because he actually took the time to learn how to cook unlike the rest of us...
I, um, can't hold my liquor very well... I p-pass out more, if anything...
I like Bog Laurels and Sweet Williams! They grow in patches near the backwater swamp and they're really pretty!
I like to make masks, actually. I made Frank and Julie's masks and my own, of course. Joey got his bandanna from out of town and he spray painted the skull on it!

Christmas, probably. I just like to have a nice day with my parents and enjoy watching the Nightmare Before Christmas, I still have my ugly sweater my mom knit me from ages ago in the lodge! I don't know what "Tiregan" is, but it sounds nice too, Arash.
I don't really stay up past midnight too much, I'm a morning person. If I have exams though, expect me to stay up until five in the morning and then collapsing onto my desk in class.
Susie means something like "Lily", I think. I read that from a book a while ago, but I don't think I am pretty as a lily though...
I do better in cold climates, I guess. I am from Canada and the weather can drop to below freezing in fall, not to mention that it's always snowing in the Entity's version of the Lodge...
I would want to go wherever Julie wants to go. So, anywhere away from Ormond or the Fog...

There's these two survivors, I think their names were Steve and Nancy? Well, they're inseparable. They're never more than a few meters away from eachother, it makes it easier for me to chain Frenzy hits at least...
The fog has plenty, b-but The Trapper and The Shape will never get along, no matter what. It's not surprising to see them covered covered in cuts and bruises when they travel through their realms.
Hmm... I don't think I do? People do say I look super young for someone in college...
What would I do if someone was obsessed with me...? I mean, if anything, we're the ones who are obsessed. The Entity makes some people so... appealing. There's always someone to obsess over.

The Plague! She's more cursed to always carry whatever disease and spread what disease she has by, uh, vomiting on them. I've seen her do it in a trial that we both got sent to, it's disgusting what happens to the survivors.
...I won't be able to help them much. I-... I think I'd be that person in that situation.

Julie and Frank are like, the couple in the Fog! And I share a body with them, so I get a front-seat to all the lovey-dovey couple stuff they do! The whole sharing a body thing can be a problem though...

The Nurse and the Wraith are a really cute couple! They're actually the oldest one in the Fog, I think. Well, they're like one of those perfect as-seen-on-TV couples, it might just be because the Entity's realm is... well, so dark that they're perfect together.

Don't tell anyone that I know this, but there's a survivor named Yui, right? Tough biker girl from Japan, I think. She's dating the Spirit, who is like; pure fury. I have no clue how she did it, but she did.
W-what? W-why would I look at porn? I'm n-not that into sex! Plus, there isn't anything like that in the Fog!
M-maybe once or twice a day? I'm not sure. I-I'm n-not really experienced with sex--l-like, I'm not a virgin or anything but I've only... done it a few times.

There are tons of thing to see on Earth! The pyramids, Greek temples, the Eiffel Tower- I could go on and on about all of these! Earth is so big and beautiful, traveling through all the countries and sights must be amazing!

...Does it count as killing if they come back no matter how many times you put them on a hook to be sacrificed? Then yeah, I'm something of a killer. I don't like that I am, but I'm a terrible person now.
(Wasn't there some psycho in the USA with the exact same mask as her? He even had a couple movies made about him...)
...Wait a minute. That clawed glove, the sweater and fedora... are you dressing up as that disgusting Entity-sucking up creep? Don't tell me he's a super popular person where you're from.
That's a weird thing to bring up, Miss. It feels more like you're trying to hide the fact that you are her mother more than anything, y'know?
